sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../Styles/Form.css"; import CustomButton from "../Components/CustomButton"; import "../Styles/EditVendor.css"; const EditVendor = () => { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(""); const handleFirstNameChange = (e) => { setFirstName(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(firstName); }; return (
